original_text: Then all the peoples on earth will see that you are called by the name of the Lord, and they will fear you.
korean_text: 땅의 모든 백성이 여호와의 이름이 너를 위하여 불리는 것을 보고 너를 두려워하리라

sentences.original_text: Then all the peoples on earth will see
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 땅의 모든 백성이 볼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that you are called by the name of the Lord
